mapper.insert: INSERT INTO chat ( chat_id, contract_id, chat_content, chat_type, send_time ) VALUES ( chat_seq.NEXTVAL, #{roomId}, #{content}, #{type}, SYSDATE )
mapper.select: SELECT chat_id, contract_id, chat_content, chat_type, send_time FROM chat WHERE contract_id = #{value} ORDER BY send_time ASC
SELECT export_filepath FROM ( SELECT export_filepath FROM chat WHERE contract_id = #{value} AND chat_type = 'END' ORDER BY send_time DESC ) WHERE ROWNUM = 1
